....is it possible to copy my filesystem to sdb, boot from a cd and reformat sda so that i can put a few more partitions in it, and then copy the filesystem back
however, you'll need to use the "archive" switch of cp so you don't mess up permissions
you could just back up your home dir, /etc, and reinstall
is there anything that prevents you from just resizing the partitions?
also, gparted will take a *long* time, depending on the size of the volume. be patient.
just make sure none of the drives you're trying to edit are mounted.
